description: This simple casserole is packed with tender beef and root vegetables for a warming and comforting dinner.
name: Beef & Parsnip Casserole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3.2 cups beef stock, made with 2 stock cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large casserole dish on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the beef and cook for 5 minutes to brown all over, stirring.
Pour over the stock, add the chopped vegetables and rosemary and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove the lid and leave to cook for 15 minutes to reduce the sauce slightly. Serve with chopped parsley on top.
